description.p: The First Cryptocurrency Wallet with Bookkeeping and Accounting Functionality in mind for Avid traders, Small Business owners and Accountants

ul.li: BTC, DOGE, and LTC fees are now displayed before sending crypto
Fiat value can now be used when sending crypto in the dashboard
Added CRO, FTM, GLM, GNO, GRT, MKR, QNT, RNDR, and TON ERC20 tokens
QR codes can now be scanned from the desktop for dashboard sending, importing wallets and contacts, and connecting to dApps
Added an indicator to dashboard to display the currently connected network for each blockchain
Wallet Connect requests now display warning messages for unknown domains, domain mismatches, and known security risks
Support for the Solana(SOL) blockchain added to the dashboard
Enabled support for connecting to Coinbase exchange for viewing balances
Support for the Terra Classic(LUNC) blockchain added to the dashboard
Added ERC20 tokens AAVE, AMP, AXS, COMP, CRV, MANA, NMR, PEPE, SALT, SAND, SHIB, and UNI
Show password feature now present when linking an email in settings
Address QR codes can now be scanned into the dashboard send form address field
Two-factor authentication setting added for web3 requests
Crypto can now be purchased using the Transak widget on the Quick Exchange page
